name: 陳英一
objective:
《課程大綱》

本課程透過原理解說與系統實作，使學生熟悉GCP(Google Cloud Platform)及AWS(Amazon Web Service)提供之雲端開發框架，以設計大數據與人工智能應用系統。課程內容包括：資料擷取、轉換與儲存流程，資料建模、探勘與分析技術，語音、文字、影像等機器學習演算法設計，氣象、交通、互聯網、零售、金融與製造等領域人工智能應用系統開發案例。藉由實務個案教學及期末專題設計，讓學生掌握大數據分析方法，並能運用軟體工程技術，設計人工智能應用系統。

This course provides students with the knowledge and skills to design big data and artificial intelligence application systems using GCP (Google Cloud Platform) or AWS (Amazon Web Service) cloud platform services.  Course spans a variety of big data processing technologies such as capturing data, data transfer, data storage, data analysis, model assessments, machine learning algorithms, and business application systems for artificial intelligence.  Programming exercises and term projects are included to help students understand the basic ideas and practical tools in big data analytics and artificial intelligence system design.
